tables.name: terra_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Highest block number identifier in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created or included in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network instance

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the validator responsible for proposing a block

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hashed representation of the set of validators in the network

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the blockchain data was ingested into storage

tables.name: terra_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of events from the cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into the transaction and block-level data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Identifier of a block in the blockchain sequence

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the blockchain chain or network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hashed identifier of a transaction within a block

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index position of a specific event within a transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Category or type of event that occurred (e.g. block, tx, proposal)

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: Component or module originating the event within a network

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Unique identifier or reference key for an event attribute

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value associated with a specific event attribute

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index position of an attribute within an event or payload

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when event data was received and processed

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block was proposed or finalized on the network

tables.name: terra_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains a detailed view of blockchain events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing attributes about each event occurrence. The attributes are gathered from a variety of blockchain sources.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of a block on a blockchain within a specific chain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a blockchain or a block in a chain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Transaction hash or unique identifier on a blockchain

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index number of a cosmos SDK message in a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index number of an event occurring in a transaction or block

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring within a transaction or block (e.g., transfer, proposal)

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key for a JSON attribute within a cosmos SDK message or event

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value associated with an attribute key in a cosmos SDK message or event

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index number of an attribute within a message or event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into storage

tables.name: terra_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Total number of blocks in the blockchain at the time of the transaction

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Encoded information about the transaction itself, including inputs and outputs

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Additional transaction logs, events or warnings occurred during processing

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Optional free-form memo attached to a transaction, for external context

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Gas fees paid for processing the transaction, in token units

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Reason for transaction failure or success, in binary numeric format

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Relative position of the transaction within a block

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Amount of gas consumed during transaction execution

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Total amount of gas requested for transaction execution

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when transaction data was ingested into system

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Current version of the data schema, for compatibility and evolution

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: Coins paid as transaction fees, specified as individual coins

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account that grants the authority for fee payment

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account responsible for paying the transaction fees

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum amount of gas allowed for transaction execution

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Indicates whether single or multi-signature transaction mode

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Serialized JSON object containing multi-signature assets

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Block height at which transaction should expire or cancel

tables.name: terra_tx_messages
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Messages: This table contains raw data from transaction messages on various Cosmos chains. It provides a detailed view of the messages exchanged between validators in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block within the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Uniquely identifies the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction within the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Transaction index within its parent block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of this message within the transaction

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Type of message exchanged on the blockchain

columns.name: message
columns.description: Actual message data exchanged on the blockchain

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the dataset

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the schema used to store the message data

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was produced

tables.name: terra_validators
tables.description: Active Cosmos validators, a crucial component of the Cosmos Network, store and validate blocks ensuring the integrity and security of the chain. Their details are vital for users to choose a validator that suits their needs.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Address of operator entity on the Terra blockchain network

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Unique identifier for a Terra account or user entity

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public key used for consensus within the Terra network

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether a validator is jailed or not

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current operational status of a Terra validator entity

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Total tokens delegated to or held by a Terra validator entity

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Human-readable identifier for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Additional identity information for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: website
columns.description: Public website associated with a Terra validator entity

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Contact information for security concerns regarding a Terra validator entity

columns.name: details
columns.description: Miscellaneous details about a Terra validator entity

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Block height at which a validator's unbonding occurs

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Timestamp when a validator's unbonding occurs

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Current commission rate for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Maximum allowable commission rate for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Maximum allowable commission rate change for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Timestamp when a validator's commission is updated

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum self-delegation amount for a Terra validator entity

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Block height at which a validator's snapshot occurs

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Timestamp when a validator's snapshot occurs

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data is ingested into the dataset from Terra network
